comment: I am proud to say that when I started preparation for SSC exam, I was clueless. Then I bought Pinnacle book and after that Video course of the book. Thanks Pinnacle I got selected as GST Inspector.
name: Rahul Pandey
title: SSC GS Theory Book Video course

comment: I got selected in MEA which was dream. I got this dream job because Pinnacle course boost my preparation. Thanks Pinnacle for providing well structured courses
name: Shruti Sharma
title: SSC Maths 6800 TCS MCQ Chapter wise book Video course

comment: I was preparing for Govt jobs since last 5 years. I was highly frustrated. I was not getting the desired contents to crack the exam. Then I purchased Pinnacle books and also joined Pinnacle video courses. Amazingly I was on track and got selected finally.
name: Shruti Sharma
title: SSC General Studies 6500 TCS MCQ Chapter wise book Video course
